text: Heyaa,I am 16 years old and I've just recently finished my GCSEs and have gone onto a-levels I'm currently studying biology history and psychology. I am really indecisive with career choices but am currently hooked at business. I 99% think i want to become a business rep but have no clue how. I am really bad at spelling and am also really appreciative for your replies. I had a good day at school thanks. How was work? Do you enjoy working in Debenhams?
